item.description:
Hi Everyone,
I felt sorry for all the bugs..they looked more hungry than all of you would have....
So instead of eating the crunchy little creatures, the group decided last night to let THEM eat...
a good choice too...
During the fire works event, we found the best places to let them go...
Instead of the bugs squirming...the people were...
all to the sounds of the fireworks,,, they looked like they were dancing and singing like they had red antts in their pants, by golly they might have..


Anyway thank all of you for participating in my POLL to see who actually reads
s the one or 2 events that was origionally sent out to all the members who never attend, alway always say NO..etc
Or who for months never even check out the site...
if you are new, it just gets listed and e mailed...
I personally like interesting people with a sense of humor..it makes the group as great as it is ..
Those who never participate confuse me..are they not interested, not, social, not something, yes some have no time..but..there would never be time for anything then...
Any way im sorry that there are no critters for you to eat any more...we hasd spagettyworms, oatmeal poop...and any other kind of bug food/word combination you can think of... cross related things ..but...for the Pot LUck Dinner thats soon...Bring some good stuff to...

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Live Bugs Eating Contest...the bugs got a meal instead
